original_text: And unto the married I command, yet not I, but the Lord, Let not the wife depart from her husband:
korean_text: 결혼한 자들에게 내가 명하노니 (명하는 자는 내가 아니요 주시라) 여자는 남편에게서 갈라서지 말고

sentences.original_text: And unto the married I command
yet not I, but the Lord
Let not the wife depart from her husband
